entry.title: CTV+CSFS: Can we reach consensus on a first step towards covenants?
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the implementation of a "regtest" label by core developers on a particular Pull Request (PR). The query raised pertains to the feasibility and methodology for observing the operation of opcodes within a specific environment, specifically questioning whether platforms like [mempool.space](https://mempool.space) can be utilized for this purpose. This inquiry suggests a need for understanding the compatibility and functionality of testing tools and environments in relation to the development process, highlighting an interest in real-time observation and analysis of opcode execution. The focus is clearly on leveraging existing infrastructure to enhance the developer's ability to test and validate code changes effectively.
